alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 6:55PM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Period of freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Pennsylvania and northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Please report snow or ice accumulations by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
